lead_paragraph: DEVINS--Barbara Anne, age 74, of Trumbull, CT died on Sunday, April 17, 2016 after a brief illness at Masonicare Health Center, Wallingford, CT. A lifelong New York City resident, Barbara was predeceased by her parents, Hugh and Madelyn Bernhardt Devins, her sisters, Sr. Maria Margaret, S.C., Patricia Devins Morrissey (James), two brothers, Donald of Youngstown, OH, Hugh Jr. and her brother-in-law John Stroff. Barbara is survived by her brother Thomas (Marie) of Douglaston, NY and her sisters Joan of Trumbull, CT and Sally Devins Stroff of Suffern, NY along with many nieces, nephews and cousins. She was a graduate of Holy Name of Jesus Elementary School, Blessed Sacrament High School and Grace Institute Business School. Barbara was a former employee of Central National Gottesman and Marine Midland Bank. Wake at Andrett Funeral Home, 199 Bleeker Street, Thursday, April 21 from 3pm-7pm and Mass of Christian Burial at the Church of the Epiphany, Second Avenue at 22nd Street at 10am on Friday. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DEVINS, BARBARA ANNE
